submission:
class Solution:
    def countOfPairs(self, nums: List[int]) -> int:
        MOD = 10 ** 9 + 7
        n = len(nums)
        dp = [[0] * 1001 for _ in range(n)] # dp[i][j] is # of pairs up to i with arr_1[i] = j
        pf = [[0] * 1001 for _ in range(n)]
        for i in range(nums[0] + 1):
            dp[0][i] = 1
            pf[0][i] = i + 1
        for i in range(1, n):
            cur_sum = 0
            for j in range(nums[i] + 1):
                max_k = min(j, nums[i - 1], nums[i - 1] - nums[i] + j)
                dp[i][j] += pf[i - 1][max_k]
                dp[i][j] %= MOD
                cur_sum += dp[i][j]
                pf[i][j] = cur_sum
                pf[i][j] %= MOD
        return sum(dp[-1]) % MOD
